channel.title: Shiny Pokemon
channel.description:
Hello all and welcome to my thread about the famous 'shiny' pokemon.
You might think to yourself, what is a shiny pokemon? A shiny pokemon is a pokemon that appears to 'shine' when it enters battle at it also happens to be a different color then other pokemon. These shiny kind were first discovered in the metal (gold, silver, crystal) series. The reason these shiny kind are such a big deal is the fact that you have a 1/8129 chance of encountering a shiny pokemon.
Here is an example of a shiny pokemon: [img]http://cache.g4tv.com/ImageDb3/135946_S/Shiny-Pokemon-Lugia.jpg[/img]
Here are a few more links: http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Shiny_Pok%C3%A9mon http://www.serebii.net/games/shiny.shtml
Now that we have all of that taken care of, time for the universal shiny rarity system i have made.
[size=12pt][b]Rule 1[/b][/size]
All pokemon (shiny) in their first stage of evolution are a standard 1.0 points. For every stage it evolves, the pokemon receives a fraction of - 0.2.
Examples: Scyther = 1.0, Scizor = 0.8 Caterpie = 1.0, Metapod = 0.8, Beedrill = 0.6 Geodude = 1.0, Graveler = 0.8, Golem = 0.6
[size=12pt][b]Rule 2[/b][/size]
All legendary pokemon (besides Celebi [1.0] and Arceus [0.8]) are worth 2.0
[size=12pt][b]Rule 3[/b][/size]
The following pokemon have special base point values:
Pichu = 0.6 Pikachu = 0.4 Raichu = 0.2 Magikarp = 1.5 Eevee = 1.6 Ditto = 1.6 All starting pokemon = 1.8
[size=12pt][b]Rule 4[/b][/size]
The following are fractions that would require you to take points off of your shiny's point value. Respected fractions are not looked down on, as Non-respected ones are.
[b]Respected[/b]
Used Master ball to catch pokemon (unless it is legendary) = - 0.2 Cloned pokemon = - 0.3 Received from Nintendo event = - 0.2
[b]Non-respected[/b]
Used cheat to make pokemon shiny = - 0.6 Used cheat to change wild encounter = - 0.4
[size=12pt][b]Rule 5[/b][/size]
There are many bonuses you receive for capturing your shiny. They follow as:
Used poke ball to capture pokemon = + 0.2 Used great ball to capture pokemon = + 0.1 Pokemon is japanese = + 0.4 Pokemon is level 1 = + 0.7 [url=http://www.pokemonelite2000.com/forum/showpost.php?p=1187912&postcount=1]Pokemon virus = + 1.0[/url]

item.title: Shiny Pokemon
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

[left][size=36pt] ALL HAIL MISSINGNO.
BOW TO HIS SUPREME POWER OF GAME ALTERATION.
ALL HAIL MISSINGNO.[/size][/left]
[center]

[/center]
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MissingNo. ---- “Players’ reactions to MissingNo. have been the subject of sociological studies. Sociologist William Sims Bainbridge stated that Game Freak created ‘one of the most popular glitches ever in game history’, and cited its creative usage by players.”

Read full topic
